labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Server settings close but the context menu stays opened
data.expected_result: Everything closes including the context menu
data.short_description: Pressing Esc key in Server Settings don't close context menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Open "Server Settings" > "Members" - Click three dots or rightclick a member to open a context menu - Press Esc key on your keyboard (not the cross button)
